name: Love's Fortune
description:
You play as Natalie who finds themself getting their fortune told in their neighbor's shop. Despite their skepticsm, will they have a good time???

Features:

  • One singular linear ending
  • Two non-binary characters!!!
  • A cat furry that tells fortunes!!!
  • Maybe.... love????
  • Or pranks?????

This was made for the April Fool's Jam 2018, and is also my first game! It's most likley 5 or 10 minutes of gameplay, depending on how fast you read.

I may add visuals in the future when I get a tablet, but for now, enjoy!
